column4: i am trying to install an hp F4240 deskjet printer with no luck :( any1 out here that can help me?
tell what you tried already too, the more information the better

i tried installing hplip but when i open it doesnt detect any printers. and i have no idea what is the xxx:yyy ID of the printer on usb to do it manually , is there a way i can see what USB devices and their ID that are conbnected to my pc?
hplip says that my device is supported
